WRITING.TITLE: Citadel21.com - A Bitcoin Cultural Zine - Volume 3 out now!
Sick new Bitcoin Comic with 0.1 BTC hidden treasure!
WRITING.TEXT: Volume 3 of Citadel21 includes the first two episodes of Dim Zayan's amazing Bitcoin comic "Bulltardia". Buried in this story, that will unfold in the months ahead, are hidden twelve keys that together will unlock 10 Million Satoshis. **The first key is one of the reasons the Honey Badger doesn't care.** Good luck, enjoy Bulltardia and enjoy Citadel21! [https://www.citadel21.com/bulltardia-ep1](https://www.citadel21.com/bulltardia-ep1) [https://www.citadel21.com/bulltardia-ep2](https://www.citadel21.com/bulltardia-ep2)

WRITING.TITLE: Fiat has taken away freedom amp; choice. It's made us into a common man #8217;s collective. Their leaders watch in grim satisfaction. But you will learn, Bitcoin stands against the tyranny of Fiat amp; its coterie of Central Banks. Bitcoin is the essence of truth.

"A protocol which cannot be usurped by anyone and does not deviate from its promise - tick tock new block. Thousands have attempted to change Bitcoin, but only found themselves changed in the process."

WRITING.TEXT: Happy to hear! Tons of other great content to check out in the zine too!
This is only the case for the comic articles...The rest of the articles don't behave like that. We will find a way to optimize the comics for desktop too!

WRITING.TITLE: "Bitcoin exposes our incentives and shows us how fiat is robbing us of our time value. It isn #8217;t just a store of value, a censorship-resistant medium of exchange, or a predictable monetary policy; I like to refer to Bitcoin as a #8216;truth bearing asset #8217;."

BITCOIN'S BIGGEST MUSICAL PRODUCTIONS: "Once in a rare while a creator of Bitcoin music feels that a quick video made out of stock footage, price chart screenshots, and a meme or two just isn #8217;t enough to accompany their song."

"Humanity can aim to become something greater by empowering the individual, and allowing individuals to self-actualize through competition. A great society requires an equal playing field #8211; and Bitcoin is the great equalizer."
The Crypto Buzz, #2 #8212; Citadel21
Rajarshi Maitra went from zero coding experience to getting his first PR merged in Bitcoin Core in two years and five months.
Bitcoin-Inspired Webcomic Bulltardia Hides 10 Million Satoshi Prize

"Let us be critical and take a closer look into the situation, while keeping an open mind. Obviously, Bitcoin promises wonders. However, there is an elephant in the room, one that everybody seems very keen on ignoring for some reason"

BITCOIN AND PERMACULTURE: Self-reliance is a skill a true Bitcoiner aspires to master. We have become our own banks and enjoy financial sovereignty. But Bitcoin is only one of several keys towards freedom.

"The mass majority of people scrambled to purchase whatever Bitcoin they could, and as a result, the price of Bitcoin soared from $100,000 to $2,000,000 dollars per coin, before the fiat peg was finally broken. Liquidity dried up and nobody would sell a single satoshi. Fiat collapsed into oblivion."

A FOMO-cycle of an unprecedented magnitude. An event never before seen in history. An event which will render every other currency mostly useless. It sounds far fetched, but there is a chance that the next Bitcoin bullrun is the tipping point.

One of the ideas which stuck with me is hashing and its power to verify the integrity of data securely. It inspired this visualization project entitled Cloud Hashes. Since Bitcoin uses the SHA-256 algorithm, my artwork visualizes and references many elements of this hash function.
"You should be hodling, yes, but you should also be stacking. Not just stacking sats, but also stacking those immaterial qualities that give you leverage above what you could do yesterday."
Savage Bitcoiners: Interview with WhiteRabbit
Read about the adventures of Bit the Honeybadger in Dim Zayan's epic comic adventure "Bulltardia"!
WRITING.TEXT: "I've heard stories about a fearless Honeybadger who lives in the area and has a reputation of being tough and lawless." [https://citadel21.com/bulltardia-ep1](https://citadel21.com/bulltardia-ep1) [https://citadel21.com/bulltardia-ep2](https://citadel21.com/bulltardia-ep2)

"With the discovery of Bitcoin, absolute digital scarcity was discovered. The total amount of bitcoins that will ever exist is finite. To me, having grown up with the Commodore 64, the thought of this was as fascinating as the thought of a perpetual motion machine"
"To me Bitcoin is a martial art. It is the moment in between thinking of the future or the past."
Level Up Your Bitcoin Security #8212; Citadel21
"So, before the money printer can go brrrrrrr, the time machine must also go into overdrive, so the future can lend us their production."
Bitcoin and Real Estate - "Imagine if you had the opportunity to purchase 1164 acres of land for approximately $9000."
People see headlines blazoning "RECORD UNEMPLOYMENT" next to ones advertising the stock market's "RECORD HIGHS", and something doesn't add up.
"As Bitcoin lowers one's time preference, gradually, the outlook on life starts to change. An existence filled with instant gratification is replaced with one of delayed consumption."

Episode 3 of Bulltardia!
That #8217;s one of the reasons why I love the internet, and it #8217;s one of the reasons why I love Bitcoin: you don #8217;t need a fixed identity to use it.

Rather than just hodling an investment, I #8217;m holding to a set of beliefs. Core to these beliefs is the idea that when presented with a better alternative to overreaching government control, the people eventually will seek it out.
